title: Best of the Program | Guest: Megan Fox | 7/14/22
description:
Investigative journalist Megan Fox is investigating the truth of the 10-year-old girl, and she exposes how the story is even darker than initially reported. Former investment banker Carol Roth explains how inflation is inherently theft and what record-breaking 9.1% inflation means for the average American. Glenn explains how America's recent actions are affecting our relationship with other countries.
